Description: Shoulder sherd with turn to neck of Attic black-figured pottery krater; interior: glazed; exterior: black on neck; below, filleted female head facing left - sphinx or siren?
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Musée du Louvre. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
sherd reglued from numerous fragmented layers; end reg num ours
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1203)
